name: Hyori Ittai
description:
表裏一体 
Hyouri Ittai - Two sides of the same coin

This is a game where the player controls two halves of the same player, these halves are connected in life and death. The game was created for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam by one person. Free Art Assets used are credited below.

Credits:

HD-2D Background Art Suibokuga -- MMFactory 
 Platformer Set -- Szadi Art 

Controls:

Move: A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow
 Jump: Space 
 Split/Teleport to other half: Left Shift 
 Pause: Esc
